name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Most people think about the ocean as separate from the atmosphere, but really what's happening with carbon is a mirror of acidity under the ocean's surface. - Aulani Wilhelm, @ConservationOrg #LivingOceans #JacksonWild19

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: "Intelligence is not about crime or criminals. Intelligence is to know. It is knowledge that we need in order to better protect this planet." - Andrea Crosta, Earth League International #JacksonWild19 #LivingOceans

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: "Fish are in trouble, but if you're here you already know that." - Meaghan Brosnan, @WildAid The Feeding the Planet: Fishing for Solutions panel has begun! Thank you to @VulcanFilms for sponsoring such an important panel and encouraging critical conversation. #JacksonWild19

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: "Up until recently, marine mammals were the sole focus of research. It is not enough for our management strategies to focus on charismatic mega fauna and ignore the rest of the species impacted by this issue." - Michael Jasny, @NRDC #JacksonWild19 #LivingOceans//t.co/V4ipmkUwM4

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Everyday 78 millionn tons plastic produced per year goes into the oceans. By 2030 it will double, by 2050 it will be 4 times larger - and there will be more plastic than fish. Jamie Cross @ConservationOrg @JacksonWildorg//t.co/AHRE7g4lOr

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: We must leave 50% of the planet in its natural state, and manage the rest sustainably if we are to meet the climate goals and to avert an extinction crisis @JonathanBaillie @NatGeo @JacksonWildorg @wildlifedirect

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Everything started in the ocean, our sense, our eyes, our touch, even sex Jonathan Baillie Of @NatGeo at @JacksonWildorg with Sylvia Earle//t.co/bPzS8IhwO8

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: To stop climate change, stop all industrial fishing. If we destroy the fish, we destroy ourselves Paul Watson @seashepherd @JacksonWildorg

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: There are more whales and turtles in the sea today than 50 years ago because of you Sylvia Earl to Capt Paul Watson @seashepherd @JacksonWildorg//t.co/eJLEANFI8A

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: We shouldn't call it Planet Earth, we should call it Planet Ocean Capt Paul Watson @seashepherd//t.co/xE8NRpxlBu

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Like Wangari Maathai who won a Nobel Peace Prize, Capt Paul Watson deserves one too. - Save the seas, save Whales, Stop Killing Seals. @seashepherd & @JacksonWildorg WATCH WATSON

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Watching Watson I have b respect & awe 4 @seashepherd and Capt Paul Watson. This film is going to catalyze action, acticism, pro-acticism to & environmental crimes, wikdlife killings - we shd all be standing in the sights of rifles on lions, rhinos & elephants. @JacksonWildorg

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Bearing witness and doing nothing is cowardly.....We don't watch a woman being raped and do nothing Capt Paul Watson of @seashepherd in the film WATSON @JacksonWildorg//t.co/GrjBZ23pWw

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: 90% of the worlds fisheries are at or beyond capacity. 1/5 of all fish are harvested illegally. Marine Protected Areas are not being effectively enforced and 50% of marine live gone in the last 50 years Meghan Brosnan from @wildaid @JacksonWildorg//t.co/lqLwYGMz9F

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: @paulakahumbu @kwskenya @WHO @GlobalSnakebite @BioKenSnakeFarm @MOH_Kenya @UNEnvironment @USAIDKenya @KenyaRedCross #DYK, in Kenya, out of the 140 known snake species, 29 are venomous? name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: BREAKING! A huge boost for environmental rights, for the Lamu community and for our planet. The licence to build the Lamu Coal plant has been revoked! @deCOALonize @savelamu #deCOALonize #AfrikaVuka//t.co/EhbXms7iBL

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: The NET tribunal has revoked the Lamu Coal plant EIA license. Amu power has been instructed to conduct fresh EIA with detailed public participation including architectural and engineering plans of the project #deCOALonize #StopLamuCoal //t.co/v1DtXS66FQ

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: National Environment Tribunal finds the process of awarding license for Lamu coal plant irregular for lack of effective public participation among other reasons. #LamuCoalJudgement #deCOALonize

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Petitioners from Lamu celebrating the NET judgment. National Environment Tribunal observed that public participation and EIA study are the oxygen in any project. And that they can't excuse non-compliance. #LamuCoalJudgment #deCOALonize//t.co/dn6xdfJfdz

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: More than 280 coal plants, about 40 percent of the United States coal fleet, have either closed or announced plans to close since 2010. name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: 3/3 in Kenya we engage the Govt on wildlife matters thanks to open government & media. Most of us believe that wildlife r our treasures, & we promote & advocate 4 compassion & benefits to communities NOT HUNTING OR CULLING My tweets r not personal attacks on any1. pls RT

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: 2/2 #HandsOffOurElephants is the campaign that I launched w/ First Lady H.E. Margaret Kenyatta to mobilize Kenyans from all sectors of society to avert a poaching crisis. We changed laws and It worked - elephants are safe (Tanzania list 1000 per month for more than 2 yr).

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: 1/3 For those asking, I am a Kenyan African, I run a very high impact conservation org, I did my PhD at Princeton (on full scholarship) where I also teach part time. I make wildlife documentaries that shine a light on African conservation heroes and heroines.

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: 3/3 Elephants r social, thinking, feeling intelligent empathetic sentient animals. We would never condone hunting chimps, gorillas, whales, dolphins or orangutans - hunting them feels morally wrong. #Botswana must rethink this decision which has sent shockwaves around the world

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: 2/3 The lifting of the hunting ban in Botswana was decided thru consutling communities, of course they did, because they were promised that they wd earn part of the income generated. They should have been offered a choice between ecotourism dollars vs hunting dollars. #Botswana

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: The gerenuk, also known as the giraffe gazelle (swara twiga), is an xclusive browser that prefers succulent plants. Fun Fact? Gerenuks have many vocalizations e.g: a buzzing sound when startled, a whistle when annoyed & a loud bleat when in extreme danger. by Dai Watakabe//t.co/sF3NaWpJ5y

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Did you know gerenuks utilize their long necks to reach plants that grow high, some as tall as six to eight feet. They are also able to feed while standing straight up on their hind legs, using their forelegs to pull down tree branches? But first, a pose. by Dai Watakabe//t.co/YEqKLTc16j

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: "No country wants to admit that there's a problem of poaching. But Kenyans realised things were much more serious that they thought. We took to the streets to demand justice and we lobbied the government." @paulakahumbu on the ongoing fight against poaching

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: "When left alone, elephants are incredibly compassionate. If not, they are angry, anxious, delinquent - we know this. So why does it surprise us that when elephants are hunted, they are different kinds of animals? They aren't the elephants we know in Kenya?" @paulakahumbu

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: "I don't do wildlife conservation because it's a business enterprise. People won't look after wildlife because of money: I think it's about passion; heart; and common sense." @paulakahumbu on how she first fell in love with wildlife #ConservationLab2019

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: "Elephants live in families - they are ruled by women. They speak their own language; can travel vast distances. They have a giant, complex brain that is many times bigger than ours. We may never unveil all of their secrets." @paulakahumbu on the unrivalled magic of elephants

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: The anti-poaching unit at @lewa_wildlife is also led by dogs. Dogs like Ruby are trained to detect human scent which assists the rangers to track poachers much faster. #WildlifeWarriors @paulakahumbu @USAID @interior @Ilemaiyan Please RT//t.co/eMsRbaBfwW

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: This is a poll - the people voted what they believe to be the answer - most people have no idea just how threatened our wildlife is - Kenya has about 800 black rhino and approximately 400 whites which are not indigenous to Kenya but came from South Africa//t.co/9gOBiIHs9S

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: We have a total of about 1000 black and white rhinos//t.co/SQeW4dJN8l

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: @StephenGikaria2 First of all Betting is NOT A JOB! Secondly, betting works because 99.9% of people who bet lose money!! So when people WAKE UP and realise they are being duped by glossy adverts and lots of lies, they might perhaps engage in constructive employment.

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: @Peter__Kiboi @UNEnvironment God has nothing to do with the crisis we find ourselves in, Humans did this and humans can get us out of it.

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Exactly - we must compel our government to act on this ecological crisis//t.co/f9x7kkZTdS

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: We must petition parliament to declare THAT KENYA IS IN AN ECOLOGICAL CRISIS and ask President Uhuru Kenyatta to declare a NATIONAL DISASTER to bring all agencies together to halt destruction, restore ecosystems, and protect what is left. We need a Kenyan MP to sponsor this RT//t.co/HfhjXc2wcd

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: .@PDUDelivery Pollution, fires, dredging marine, droughts - BIG FOUR is a great idea but we r killing our country's natural wealth & making Kenya poorer. Kenya is in an ECOLOGICAL CRISIS - Pres must declare a National Disaster to clean up, restore and Protect the environment RT//t.co/Flzeq6vZnH

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: True//t.co/LnrScwhNHm

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: .@UNEnvironment 3/3 ur HQ is in Nairobi - pls declare Kenya's ENVIRONMENTAL & ECOLOGICAL SITUATION A CRISIS - We must stop dreadgung coast, end illegal grazing in parks, stop trafficking wildlife thru Kenya, create incentives to restore forests & habitats, empower communities rt

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: .@UNEnvironment 2/3 Dependence on fuel wood, encroachment if development in parks, uncontrolled grazing in parks, sand harvesting severe habitat degradation, explosion of invasive species like hyacinth, opuntia, Dodder, KENYA IS EXPERIENCING AN ECOLOGICAL DISASTER

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: .@UNEnvironment 1/3 Wildlife numbers down by 88% Lion, rhinos, giraffe r all on the endangered species list Pangolins, rhino horn, lion bones, donkey skins, timber, sea cucumbers, sharks being illegally exported at astronomical rates. KENYA IS FACING AN ECOLOGICAL CRISIS.

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Kenya has only 2000 lions, 45 r in Nairobi Park, in Mara we know t/ prides, Marsh pride, 3 Musketeers, Ridge pride etc, in Samburu they r also known named & studied by @EwasoLions - the local names also create local pride. For elephants in Amboseli there are 1,700 all have names//t.co/YqUbw69aDo

text: @WillKnocker What has rewinding got to do with anything g - we are just trying to keep the wild wild. What we should STOP doing is blindly following what someone overseas has decided us good or proper

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: @WillKnocker All the elephants of Amboseli and , Samburu have names, like Tim, Tolstoy, and Echo. it has helped create mass public interest in these giants. How on earth can this be bad?

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: @WillKnocker It helps enormously if people in UK fall in love with the Marsh Pride on BBC and know Scar, Lipstick and all the lionesses, why shouldn't Kenyans know them too? Kenyans go to Nairobi Park to see Kitili and his pose - I think it's FANTASTIC that we can create interest this way

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: You can tell the difference in age among Vulturine Guineafowls through the color of their eyes. The adults have a brighter red eye while the chicks have darker eyes. @paulakahumbu @BRENDAHNYAGUTH2 #WIldlifeWarriors @USAID @Interior @citizentvkenya//t.co/5YtcONwHvO

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Each bird is individually tagged with a unique combination of colored leg bands which allows detailed studies of their social position in the flock. @paulakahumbu @BRENDAHNYAGUTH2 #WIldlifeWarriors @USAID @Interior @citizentvkenya//t.co/h3YyiMP3hx

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: The Vulturine Guineafowl project involves recording how they forage, how they interact with each other in order to know who is dominate over the other and determine the hierarchal status of each bird in the flock. @paulakahumbu @BRENDAHNYAGUTH2 #WIldlifeWarriors @USAID @Interior//t.co/uTUoI5yqOW

text: The bride of the Samburu tribe must not show any affection towards her husband on her wedding day. These are stoic people & she must not shed tears as they leaves her fathers home for the last time. #Kenya @magicalkenya #Samburu//t.co/MzXbITVysL

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: The bride of the Samburu tribe must not show any affection towards her husband on her wedding day. These are stoic people & she must not shed tears as they leaves her fathers home for the last time. #Kenya @magicalkenya #Samburu//t.co/MzXbITVysL

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Certain warriors of the Samburu Tribe are known for their voice and pacing of songs, their haunting chants are mesmerizing. #Kenya @magicalkenya//t.co/aJjOGAWQ8i

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: The Samburu call themselves the butterfly people. The men wear elaborate head dresses and beadwork, but despite the explosion of colour they maintain a fierce expression - afterall, they are warriors. They came to dance @magicalkenya//t.co/JHTpo4wtzk

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Young girls wear different beads to the adults. They dance with abandon & adults appreciate them by placing a hand on their foreheads - the colour of the beads of girls are important. #Kenya @magicalkenya//t.co/RQbMTmZ5lI

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Hundreds of people attend a traditional Samburu wedding, all dressed in beautiful traditional attire, the beads of every woman are different & there's a story in the beads unique to each lady #Kenya @magicalkenya//t.co/A7KiPQzVa6

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: There are no speeches at a Samburu wedding, but there is a lot of dancing, singing and then more ...warriors and dancers arrive from the corners of Samburu lands to attend these spectacular weddings @magicalkenya//t.co/u7sYsEoLNy

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: A SAmburu wedding is something worth putting on your bucket list- I've attended one and it was a mind blowing, mesmerizing, explosion of sound, colour and people - First meet the bride #Kenya #WondersOfSamburu @magicalkenya//t.co/TDoAUn8gis

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: @paulakahumbu Wlidlife conservation is a complex and daunting challenge for many countries across Africa. Your conversation today with On Point's host helped significantly to illuminate this issue for lay people like me. Thank you!

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: @SaraTEvans @DrLukeHunter @paulakahumbu "People tend to think that trophy hunting is a major cause of lion decline, but if you look at all the threats that there are to lions, it's not one of the major ones," @SaraTEvans says. "It can be in certain areas, but as a whole, the biggest threat is their habitat loss."

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: @SaraTEvans @DrLukeHunter @paulakahumbu "With the cave lions, it's thought that the most likely cause of their demise is actually a changing climate," @SaraTEvans says.

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: Lions are one of the iconic animals of the African plains ... and of the Disney universe. But in ~20 years the African lion population has dropped by more than 40 percent. Can they be saved? We discuss with @SaraTEvans, @DrLukeHunter and @paulakahumbu://t.co/UACuYoKKsV//t.co/799IK41967

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: @SaraTEvans @DrLukeHunter @paulakahumbu The interaction between humans and lions goes back thousands of years, and we can tell by cave paintings. "You can sense some respect from the painters," @SaraTEvans says.

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: 3/3 thinking of the children who witnessed the shooting, & those who xperience it vicariously. Long term how will #ParklandShooting affect the thinking, & actions of victims & peers of the shooter? Terrible day for Florida - my thoughts r w/ you

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: 2/3 My son was born in Florida, #ParklandShooting feels real. May the shooter get what he deserves, but whats being done to prevent young men from going off the rails? How can parents be helped to ensure that their children don't get onto a path of a mass killer?

name: Dr. Paula Kahumbu
text: 1/3 Florida is known as the Sunny State, but today it plunged into darkness with the shooting of 17 high school students. Tragic that class in USA includes training on how to deal with shooters. No words for the shooter, love & healing 4 the berieved & injured #ParklandShooting
